meanings.definition: Saxmen: plural form of saxman, a musician who plays the saxophone.
meanings.sent1: The saxmen played beautiful music at the concert.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of saxmen performing in the park.
meanings.sent3: The saxmen decided to start a band called 'The Sax Squad'.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the saxmen's music filled the room like a warm breeze.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the saxmen play always puts me in a good mood.

meanings.definition: Saxmen: a group of saxophone players performing together.
meanings.sent1: Last night, the saxmen gave an amazing show at the jazz club.
meanings.sent2: The saxmen in the orchestra played in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The saxmen wore matching hats during their performance.
meanings.sent4: The saxmen on stage looked like a colorful bouquet of musical talent.
meanings.sent5: The audience cheered loudly for the talented saxmen.
